li.label: psychic soothe
li.description: This voice... I do not recognize it. It tries to silence the others.

li.label: low psychic drone
li.description: It's like a scratching at the back of my mind. Another voice, whispering. I can only make out a few words, and I like them.

li.label: moderate psychic drone
li.description: I feel like someone is always just out of sight, speaking to me. The voice changes but the message doesn't. I'm supposed to hurt people. How exciting!

li.label: high psychic drone
li.description: The voice is incredibly loud. It's quite cathartic, in a way.

li.label: extreme psychic drone
li.description: My heart pounds and I'm sweating. All I can think of is hurting and suffering and all these enemies around me. It's like a dream.
